messages.message: Hey @pauline.comising or @Weiming Wu, when switching from legacy to advanced, can we check if a project has classes, and skip the confirmation if no? https://www.figma.com/design/1GTN3fSYdAbrK2UJqODW4Q/EPD-4651-Doc-AI?node-id=5042-27279&t=riUtINavH1heYn1r-1
whoops, that's actually the wrong Figma workflow, but the question still stands as worded.
